sailpoint.api
Class Emailer

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.api.Emailer

public class Emailer
extends java.lang.Object

A service that can send emails and capture error messages.

Method Detail

compileOpenCertEmail

public EmailTemplate compileOpenCertEmail(EmailTemplate template,
                                          Attributes attrs)
                                   throws GeneralException
Compile the given "open certification" email template with the given attributes. The Attributes should contain the OPEN_CERTIFICATION_CERTIFIER_ID and OPTIONS_RECIPIENT_EMAIL. The following arguments are provided when compiling the email template:
  • certifierName
  • certifier (same as certifierName)
  • certificationCount - The number of incomplete certifications owned by the certifer.
  • certification_count (same as certificationCount)

Parameters:
template - The template to compile.
attrs - The Attributes from which to retrieve the recipient ID and email.
Returns:
The compiled EmailTemplate, or null if there is no recipient specified or the recipient could not be loaded using the given ID.
Throws:
GeneralException - If there is a general error.

getCertReminderEmailRecipient

public Identity getCertReminderEmailRecipient(java.lang.String certId)
                                       throws GeneralException
Return the recipient for the Certification Reminder email for the given certification.

Throws:
GeneralException

compileCertReminderEmail

public EmailTemplate compileCertReminderEmail(EmailTemplate template,
                                              java.lang.String certId,
                                              java.lang.String recipientId,
                                              Identity sender)
                                       throws GeneralException
Compile the Certification Reminder email template with the given information. The following arguments are provided when compiling the email template:
  • certification - The Certification object.
  • recipient - The recipient Identity.
  • sender - The sender Identity.

Throws:
GeneralException

compileAccessRequestReminderEmail

public EmailTemplate compileAccessRequestReminderEmail(EmailTemplate template,
                                                       java.lang.String workItemId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientId)
                                                throws GeneralException
Compile the Access Request Reminder email template with the given information. The following arguments are provided when compiling the mail template:
  • workItemName
  • workItemDescription
  • workItem (null if the work item is archived)

      • Throws:
      GeneralException

sendEmailNotification

public void sendEmailNotification(EmailTemplate email,
                                  EmailOptions ops)
Send the given email and save any errors encountered while mailing.

Parameters:
email - The EmailTemplate to send.
ops - The EmailOptions to use.
